::KitKat:;

She smiled at Drillbit.  "I just got an offer I couldn't refuse right 
now.  I hope it will mean re-enforcements are on the way."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit ran to KitKat's side, still shooting at the Maximals.
> "What was that all about?" He asked.
